articles.author: DEVI SHASTRI AP Health Writer
articles.title: US measles cases surpass 700 with outbreaks in six states. Here's what to know - KATU
articles.description: U.S. measles cases topped 700, capping a week in which Indiana joined five others states with active outbreaks, and a third measles death was revealed.
articles.content: U.S. measles cases topped 700 as of Friday, capping a week in which Indiana joined five other states with active outbreaks, Texas grew by another 60 cases and a third measles-related death was made p… [+8494 chars]
